trans-unit.source: Provides a design-time user interface for selecting an XML data file.
trans-unit.target: Gir et brukergrensesnitt for utforming for å velge en XML-datafil.

trans-unit.source: An XmlDataFileEditor object is used at design time to select and edit a URL for an XML data file (.xml), and then assign the URL to a control property.
trans-unit.target: Objektets XmlDataFileEditor brukes til å velge og redigere en URL-adresse for en XML-datafilen (XML) og tilordne URL-adressen til en kontroll under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control uses the XmlDataFileEditor class at design time to set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.DataFile%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>kontrollen bruker klassen XmlDataFileEditor under utformingen til å angi verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.DataFile%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.DataFile%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> attribute to associate the XmlDataFileEditor with a property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute>attributtet knytte XmlDataFileEditor til en egenskap.</xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute>

trans-unit.source: When the associated property is edited on the design surface, the designer host calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Når den tilknyttede egenskapen redigeres på utformingsoverflaten, designer verten kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A> method, which in turn displays a user interface for selecting the URL, and then returns the URL that is selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A>metoden bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A>metode, som i sin tur viser et brukergrensesnitt for å velge URL-adressen, og returnerer deretter URL-adressen som er valgt av brukeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method indicates the display style of the user interface.
Derive a class from the XmlDataFileEditor to define a custom editor for an XML data property.
trans-unit.target: Utledet en klasse fra XmlDataFileEditor til å definere en egendefinert redigeringsprogrammet for en XML-data-egenskap.

trans-unit.source: For example, a derived class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A> method, and then call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A> method with a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.XmlDataFileEditor.Filter%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.XmlDataFileEditor.Caption%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en avledet klasse kan overstyre den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A>metoden og kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A>metode med en egendefinert <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.XmlDataFileEditor.Filter%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.XmlDataFileEditor.Caption%2A>verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.XmlDataFileEditor.Caption%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.XmlDataFileEditor.Filter%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.XmlDataFileEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.XmlDataFileEditor"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the caption to display on the selection dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Henter teksten skal vises i dialogboksen for valg.

trans-unit.source: The Caption property is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A> method when calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A> method, which displays the URL selection dialog box to the user at design time.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen tittel brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A>metoden når du kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A>metode, som viser dialogboksen for valg av URL-adressen til brukeren på utformingstidspunktet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The caption text to display on the selection dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Teksten teksten som skal vises i dialogboksen for valg.

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL filter options for the editor, which is used to filter the items that appear in the URL selection dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Henter URL-adressen filteralternativene for redigeringsprogrammet for som brukes til å filtrere elementene som vises i dialogboksen for valg av URL-adresse.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents one or more URL filter options for the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer en eller flere URL-adressen filteralternativene for dialogboksen.
